-class Roupa:%0A    def __init__(self):%0A        self.__tamanho: str = %22%22%0A    %0A    def getTamanho(self):%0A        return self.__tamanho%0A    %0A    def setTamanho(self, numeracao: str):%0A        tamanhos_permitidos = %5B%22P%22, %22PP%22, %22M%22, %22G%22, %22GG%22, %22GG%22%5D%0A        if numeracao not in tamanho_validos:%0A            print(%22fail: Valor invalido, tente PP, P, M, G, GG ou XG%22)%0A        else:%0A            self.__tamanho = numeracao%0A        %0A    def show(self) -%3E None:%0A        print(self)%0A    %0A    def_str_(self):%0A        return (f%22size: (%7Bself.getTamanho()%7D)%22)%0A%0A%0Adef main():%0A        roupa = Roupa()%0A%0A        while True:%0A            line = input()%0A            print(%22$%22 + line)%0A            args = line.split(%22 %22)%0A%0A            if args%5B0%5D == %22end%22:%0A                break%0A            if args%5B0%5D == %22show%22:%0A                print(roupa)%0A            if args%5B0%5D == %22size%22:%0A                numeracao = args%5B1%5D%0A                roupa.setTamanho(numeracao)%0A%0Amain()
